Modelica.Mechanics

Library of 1-dim. and 3-dim. mechanical components (multi-body, rotational, translational)

Information




This package contains components to model the movement
of 1-dim. rotational, 1-dim. translational, and
3-dim. mechanical systems.




Extends from Modelica.Icons.Library2 (Icon for library where additional icon elements shall be added).

Package Content




NameDescription


 MultiBody
Library to model 3-dimensional mechanical systems


 Rotational
Library to model 1-dimensional, rotational mechanical systems


 Translational
Library to model 1-dimensional, translational mechanical systems
